  • Method Details

    • addGym

      @POST @Path("/gym") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addGym(@QueryParam("userId") String userId, @Valid @Valid FlipFitCentre gym)
      Adds a new gym to the system. This method consumes a JSON representation of a FlipFitCentre object and adds it using the provided user ID. If the gym is added successfully, a response with a success message is returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user adding the gym
      gym - the FlipFitCentre object representing the gym to be added
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the success of the operation

    • modifyGym

      @PUT @Path("/gym/{gymId}") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response modifyGym(@PathParam("gymId") String gymId, @QueryParam("userId") String userId, @Valid @Valid FlipFitCentre gym)
      Modifies an existing gym in the system. This method consumes a JSON representation of a FlipFitCentre object and updates the gym with the specified gym ID. It also uses the provided user ID to verify permissions. Responses vary based on the outcome of the modification.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym to be modified
      userId - the ID of the user performing the modification
      gym - the FlipFitCentre object containing the updated gym details
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the modification

    • removeGym

      @DELETE @Path("/gym/{gymId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeGym(@PathParam("gymId") String gymId, @QueryParam("ownerId") String ownerId)
      Removes a gym from the system. This method uses the provided gym ID and owner ID to delete a gym. If the operation is successful, a success message is returned. If not authorized, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym to be removed
      ownerId - the ID of the owner requesting the removal
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the removal operation

    • viewGyms

      @GET @Path("/gyms") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewGyms(@QueryParam("userId") String userId)
      Retrieves a list of all gyms associated with the specified user. This method returns a list of FlipFitCentre objects representing all gyms for the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose gyms are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCentre objects

    • viewRegisteredGyms

      @GET @Path("/gyms/registered") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewRegisteredGyms(@QueryParam("userId") String userId)
      Retrieves a list of gyms registered by the specified user. This method returns a list of FlipFitCentre objects for gyms that are registered by the user with the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose registered gyms are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCentre objects

    • viewGymsByCity

      @GET @Path("/gyms/city") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewGymsByCity(@QueryParam("userId") String userId, @QueryParam("city") String gymCity)
      Retrieves a list of gyms in a specific city for the given user. This method validates the city name before fetching the list of gyms for that city and user ID. If the city name is invalid, a bad request response is returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose gyms are to be retrieved
      gymCity - the city for which gyms are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCentre objects or an error message

    • addSlot

      @POST @Path("/slot") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addSlot(@QueryParam("gymId") String gymId, @QueryParam("startTime") String startTime, @QueryParam("seats") int noOfSeats)
      Adds a new slot to a gym. This method uses the gym ID, start time, and number of seats to add a slot. It validates the time format and seat capacity before performing the operation.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym where the slot is to be added
      startTime - the start time of the slot
      noOfSeats - the number of seats available in the slot
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the slot addition

    • removeSlot

      @DELETE @Path("/slot/{slotId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeSlot(@PathParam("slotId") String slotId)
      Removes an existing slot from a gym. This method uses the slot ID to remove the slot. If the slot ID is invalid, a bad request response is returned.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot to be removed
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the slot removal

    • editSlot

      @PUT @Path("/slot/{slotId}") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response editSlot(@PathParam("slotId") String slotId, @QueryParam("startTime") String startTime, @QueryParam("seats") int noOfSeats)
      Updates an existing slot in a gym. This method updates the slot details using the slot ID, start time, and number of seats. It validates the time format and seat capacity before performing the update.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the ID of the slot to be updated
      startTime - the new start time for the slot
      noOfSeats - the new number of seats available in the slot
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the slot update

    • viewAllSlots

      @GET @Path("/slots") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewAllSlots(@QueryParam("gymId") String gymId)
      Retrieves all slots for a specific gym. This method returns a list of FlipFitCenterSlot objects representing all slots for the given gym ID.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym whose slots are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCenterSlot objects

    • viewAvailableSlots

      @GET @Path("/slots/available") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewAvailableSlots(@QueryParam("gymId") String gymId, @QueryParam("date") String date)
      Retrieves a list of available slots for a specific gym on a specified date. This method validates the date format before fetching the available slots from the gym. If the gym ID is invalid or if there is a validation error with the date, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym for which available slots are to be retrieved
      date - the date for which available slots are to be fetched, in the expected format
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitCenterSlot objects or an error message

    • viewAllBookings

      @GET @Path("/bookings") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response viewAllBookings(@QueryParam("gymId") String gymId, @QueryParam("date") String date)
      Retrieves a list of all bookings for a specific gym on a specified date. This method validates the date format before fetching the bookings for that gym and date. If the gym ID is invalid or there is a date validation error, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym for which bookings are to be retrieved
      date - the date for which bookings are to be fetched, in the expected format
      Returns:
      a Response containing a list of FlipFitSlotBooking objects or an error message

    • editProfile

      @PUT @Path("/profile") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response editProfile(@QueryParam("userId") String userId, @QueryParam("address") String address, @QueryParam("pan") String pan, @QueryParam("gst") String gst)
      Updates the profile information for a specific user. This method validates the PAN and GST numbers before updating the user's profile with the new address, PAN, and GST details. If the user ID is invalid or there are validation errors, an appropriate error message is returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose profile is to be updated
      address - the new address of the user
      pan - the new PAN card number of the user
      gst - the new GST number of the user
      Returns:
      a Response indicating the result of the profile update
